mapper.select: SELECT d.department_name AS 'departmentName', sum( CASE WHEN s.sex = '男' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'numberOfMales', sum( CASE WHEN s.sex = '女' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS 'numberOfFemales' FROM student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.department_id = d.department_id GROUP BY s.department_id, d.department_name;
